remarks: Given three colinear points ` A ` , ` B ` , and ` C ` , ` B ` falls in the middle iff the two segments to ` B ` are no longer than ` A C ` .  Theorem 5.12 of [Schwabhauser] p. 42.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: colinbtwnle $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( A Colinear <. B , C >. -> ( B Btwn <. A , C >. <-> ( <. A , B >. Seg<_ <. A , C >. /\ <. B , C >. Seg<_ <. A , C >. ) ) ) ) $.
